We are Eraser, and this is our story:

I formed Eraser in 2018, at first I never intended for this to be my long-term job. I made this software for myself so I could get a job because I had posted some really stupid things on my social media and couldn't delete them. So I made this software which searches the internet for any trace of your name and deletes it, so you never have to worry about it :)

- John, our wonderful founder


Here at Eraser we have Three Core Pillars which we always try to follow:

  • Pillar one:

    Hold the customer's privacy above all, they came here for a reason - we don't need to know that reason, all we need is a name

  • Pillar two:

    Never keep any old names, addresses, pictures, anything of the old customer. The second they leave our doors they are a new person who has never used our business

  • Pillar three

    Always respect the customer. We have all done stupid things but none of us deserve those things to haunt us forever

Now that you know our Three Core Pillars, it's time to start your new life!
